News.headline: Match Preview: York City v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: York City v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: York City v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League fixture against York City on Saturday.
News.description:
The Daggers will be hoping to bounce back following their 2-1 defeat to FC Halifax Town in the Emirates FA Cup on Tuesday.Â 

York City currently sit just outside the relegation zone on goal difference after struggling in the first half of the season.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers

FC Halifax Town 2-1 Daggers (Emirates FA Cup)

Daggers 0-5 Gateshead

Daggers 0-0 Halifax (Emirates FA Cup)

Forest Green 1-1 Daggers

Daggers 1-0 Aldershot

York City

Eastleigh 1-1 York

York 2-2 Sutton

Southport 2-0 York

York 1-1 Chester

Curzon Ashton 2-1 York (EmiratesFA Cup)

Team News

Okenabirhie, Robson, Howell and Williams will still miss out following their injuries. Robinson could feature after travelling back from his England C duty. Oliver Hawkins red card appeal was successful so he will be available, Andre Boucaud returns from international duty whilst Heard and Barnwell are available again after being cup tied on Tuesday.

Previous Meetings

The Daggers and York have met 14 times with the Daggers winning six and losing five. The recent meeting came last season in League Two when the Daggers won the home fixture 1-0 and drew the away fixture 2-2.

Fixtures

There is a full list of Vanarama National League fixtures on Saturday with a 3pm kick off (unless stated)

Aldershot V Macclesfield

Barrow V Solihull

Boreham Wood V Southport

Braintree V Tranmere

Chester V Bromley

Dover V Guiseley

Forest Green V Lincoln (12:15 KO)

Gateshead V Eastleigh

Maidstone V Woking

North Ferriby V Sutton

Torquay V Wrexham

York V Dagenham and Redbridge

Social Media & Online

Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
